column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
column14: I'm a sucker for packaging! These babies are nestled above my scents, beneath my"Makeup" face cloths and with my treasured antique hands mirror. More importantly I'm no longer a sucker for Sucker Punch at almost $40 a tube when I can have better quality, quantity and variety for so much less!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
column14: The formula has great staying power.. I Merlot on and it lasted through eating and drinking.. Slight amount of transfer while it’s still drying.. which takes a while and it’s sticky until it’s done drying.. I’d say like 15-20 minutes.. After it’s dry very very little transfer.. The pictures showed are the color directly after drying and then 24 hrs later.. I slept with it on and then it was rubbed against my jeans all day at work.. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the actual color pallet.. I’m disappointed in the two darkest shades.. The ads show them being nice deep purple colors but in reality the whole set it just varying shades of pinks and reds.. Pretty.. But I was really looking forward to those deep purple tones..

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
column14: WOW! Im actually sitting here at 3o'clock in the morning writing this review because I am so amazed by this product!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
column14: This is one of the few real lipstains on Amazon, it stains (and stays on) like permanent marker.  It comes with applicators, but applies and dries like permanent marker without the sticky feeling on your lips. The colors are dark and bright if you apply them like the description says.  I prefer a more natural/subtle look, so I only put one layer on the inside of the lips (as suggested), then smear it with my finger to cover the rest of the lips, and use a makeup remover to clean up the lines. I put on lip balm on top to keep my lips from drying.  This stays on all day until I remove it.  Even after eating greasy food, it barely fades. I just re-apply lip balm, and not have to worry about looking in the mirror.  The first picture is without any lipstick, the others are with the lightest application of 4 colors.  I probably won't use the 2 darkest ones.  I wish they made them in natural shades, too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2019
column14: This is a great price point for 6 lip different shades of lip tint. They come in the cutest bottles I’ve ever seen, little wine bottles. I did need to put on many layers in to get the look of the colors in the pictures. But you get long lasting color, that doesn’t smudge easy I don’t get those gross lip stains on glasses and easy to remember. If anything Issue,I would say it'd be nice to use less coats but the color looks amazing monday the less

column6: Excellent lip stain, cute package, great price!!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2019
column14: Excellent product. This is a lip stain, so not moisturizing. But, it's long lasting with pretty colors that come in cute little wine bottle applicators. Would definitely recommend to someone looking for a good lip stain.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
column14: I don’t usually write reviews but this product is amazing. 1) The packaging is adorable and easy to toss in your purse 2) It’s buildable coverage. You can go sheer or add another layer for a bolder look 3) IT DOES NOT BUDGE! I applied it and waited about 5 minutes. There is zero transfer even after rubbing it hard with my hand.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
column14: Me gusta mucho la variedad de colores y calidad precio , son mis Lips favoritos y los recomiendo 100% todos los colores bellos y no muy duros para diferentes tonos de piel , duran 3 hrs comiendo y bebiendo , cada color tiene una textura distinta en los labios , algunos son más como un labial y otros como una tinta labial , cada uno tiene su encanto , me gusta mucho para su precio , y es matte.
